Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: BEAst: This document describes the BEAst profile, and how BEAst's order response messages, version 3.1, for NeC, Rental and Material are linked to the Peppol structure. Peppol: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Order response identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T3345, Order response number. Peppol: A transaction instance must have an identifier. The identifier enables referencing the transaction for various purposes such as from other transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Sales order reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T6099, Supplier's Order number. Peppol: An identifier of a referenced sales order, issued by the Seller.

Element.Name: Order response issue date
Element.Description: BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol: The date on which the transaction instance was issued.

Element.Name: Order response issue time
Element.Description: BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol: The time on which the transaction instance was issued

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6114, Order response status. Peppol: A code that indicates whether the referenced order has been received and not yet processed, or is Accepted or Rejected as whole, alternatively, Accepted with change or already delivered. If response code is Accept or Reject there may not be any response lines.

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: BEAst: T6008 and T6038, Transport information or Supplier's remark. Peppol: Clarification of the suppliers decision.
Element.Value: Response message with amendments in the details

Element.Name: Document currency
Element.Description: BEAst: T6018, Order Currency. Peppol: The default currency for the offer.

Element.Name: Buyer reference identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T6004, Project number. Peppol: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.The identifier is defined by the buyer (contact ID, department, office id, project code), but provided by the seller in the order response.

Element.Name: Order reference
Element.Description: BEAst: The order response message always is preceeded by an order message. If the order response is a confirmation of something ordered by telephone, in a shop or a supplier portal, the Peppol message OrderAgreement should be used instead.

Element.Name: Order document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T3309 and T6335, Reference to the Order/Calloff. Peppol: Used to reference the order that is being responded to.

Element.Name: Seller party electronic address
Element.Description: BEAst: T0009 or T6001, Identification of the Supplier. Peppol: Identifies the seller party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Seller party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0009 or T6001, Identification of the Supplier. Peppol: Identifies a party.

Element.Name: Seller party name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the Supplier. Peppol: The name of the party.

Element.Name: Buyer party electronic address
Element.Description: BEAst: T0008 or T6001, Identification of the Buyer. Peppol: Identifies the buyer party's electronic address

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: Scheme identifier for the electronic address

Element.Name: Buyer party identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0008 or T6001, Identification of the Buyer. Peppol: An identification for the buyer party.

Element.Name: Buyer party name
Element.Description: BEAst: T5001, Name of the Buyer. Peppol: The name of the party who ordered the items and receives the response.

Element.Name: Delivery information
Element.Description: BEAst: Confirmation of delivery dates are always at line level, not here.

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: The time at which this period begins. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: The time at which this period end. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Specification of order lines
Element.Description: BEAst: Orderlines should be included in the order response only when the OrderResponseCode is "CA" (Conditionally Accepted). For all other codes only the document header should be sent. When the order is Conditionally Accepted, all orderlines shall be included, not only those that are changed.

Element.Name: Document line identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0051, Line number. Peppol: Identifies the response line. Each order response line MUST be unique within the order response.

Element.Name: Response clarification
Element.Description: BEAst: T6031, Line item information. Peppol: Clarifacation of the suppliers decision for the line.

Element.Name: Response code
Element.Description: BEAst: T6115 and T6384, Line Status. Peppol: A code that indicates whether the referenced order line as whole is Accepted or Rejected or, alternatively, Accepted with change.

Element.Name: Quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: T3240, Quantity to be delivered. unitCode = T6706, Measure Unit NeB Type. Peppol: The quantity of items that will be delivered.

Attribute.Name: Ordered quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the ordered quantity.

Element.Name: Maximum backorder quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: T0059 and T6461, Backordered quantity. Peppol: The quantity of items that will be delivered at a later time. A unit for the backordered quantity is the same as for the Quantity. If none of the remaining quantity for the response line is to be delivered, use 0 "zero".

Element.Name: Period start date
Element.Description: BEAst: T6319 and T6461, Delivery period Start date. Peppol: The date on which the period starts. The start dates counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period start time
Element.Description: BEAst: T6734, Delivery period Start time. Peppol: The time at which this period begins. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Period end date
Element.Description: BEAst: T6320 and T6462, Delivery period End date. Peppol: The date on which the period ends. The end date counts as part of the period.

Element.Name: Period end time
Element.Description: BEAst: T6735, Delivery period End time. Peppol: The time at which this period end. Format = "hh:mm:ss"

Element.Name: Item price
Element.Description: BEAst: T6235, Price amount. currencyID = T6018, Order currency. Peppol: The net price of an item including discounts or surcharges that apply to the price.Although price is an optional element in an offer it recommended as best practice to either state the price or provide reference to an appropriate source from which the price can be identified such as a contract, catalogue or a quote.. The price amount. The net price of the item including all allowances, charges and taxes but exluding TAX.

Attribute.Description: Currency identifier, must have the same value as element "Document currency".

Element.Name: Item price base quantity
Element.Description: BEAst: T6722, Price unit basis quantity. unitCode = T6706, Measure Unit NeB Type. Peppol: The actual quantity to which the price applies.

Attribute.Name: Base quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the base quantity.

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: BEAst: T6226, Article description. Peppol: A short name given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T6022, T6417 and T0172 if T6317 = "BP", Buyers part article number. Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyer's system.

Element.Name: The Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0172, Supplier's article number. Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Substituted line item by the seller
Substituted Line Item Identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0051, Line number. Peppol: Identifier of the substituted line item

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: BEAst: T6226, Article description of the replacing article. Peppol: A short name optionally given to an item, such as a name from a Catalogue, as distinct from a description. A short name for the item.

Element.Name: Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0172, Supplier's article identification of the replacing article. Peppol: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the seller's system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol: An item identifier based on a registered scheme. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Item standard identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: BEAst: Used to classify the material when the item number is not sufficient (T6466), to inform about the source of classification standard (T6467) and to provide standard branch codes for the items. The Reference to Article Class (T6466) is the ItemClassificationCode, listID = "ZZZ", listVersionID the version of the codelist in attribute "name" and name is the name of the codelist or Source to Classification (T6467). Peppol: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: BEAst: For Item Classification Codes that are found in UNCL7143, select the correct code and leave listVersionID and name empty. For construction specific list that are not a part of UNCL7143 yet ListID must always be "ZZZ" and listVersionID the version of the codelist in attribute "name", i.e. mutually agreed. Peppol: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: BEAst: If construction specific lists are used, name specifies which of them is used. Possible names are: "AI", "CoClass”, “ME”, "SA", "SB", "SBF", and "SBMI". AI: Återvinningsindustrierna, ME: Maskinentreprenörerna, SA: Sveriges Åkeriföretag, SB: Svensk Betong, SBF: Svensk Beläggningsförening, SBMI: Sveriges Bergmaterialindustrier. Until the list of organisations issuing Article numbers have been updated, also the following values can be used as names: "NOBB", "RT", "TUN", "Finfo", "RSK_SE", "RSK_NO", "ENO_SE", "ENO_NO". Peppol: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Item TAX category code
Element.Description: The TAX category code for the item.

Element.Name: Line TAX rate
Element.Description: The TAX percentage rate that applies to the line amount.
Tax scheme. E.g. “VAT” or “GST”

Element.Name: Additional item property information
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

Element.Name: Item property name
Element.Description: The name of the property.The name must be sufficiently descriptive to define the value. The definition may be supplemented with the property unit of measure when relevant.

Element.Name: Item property code
Element.Description: Code for the item property according to a property code system.

Attribute.Name: Name code list id.
Attribute.Description: An identifier for the code list used for the Name code, this is bilaterally agreed

Element.Name: Item property value
Element.Description: The value of the item property.

Element.Name: Item property unit of measure
Element.Description: The unit of measure in which the property value is stated, if relevant. May not be relevant when properties are descriptive.

Attribute.Name: Value quantity unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the value quantity.

Element.Name: Property classification
Element.Description: Standardized and predefined classification of items properties.

Element.Name: Order line reference
Element.Description: BEAst: T3322 and T6336, Reference to Order line. Peppol: Used to reference the initial order line that correspondes to the response.All order lines should be stated when an order is changed.
